duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage all phases of project planning and execution to ensure project success factors are met.
Directly work with a full project team on a daily basis.
Manage funding and budgeting of the project/program.
Execute both New and Rebuild/Expansion of Substations & Transmission Lines.
Maintain expertise in project-related Scheduling, Cost Controls, Quality, and Risk Management.
Utilize advanced knowledge/experience in Microsoft Office products including OneNote, SharePoint, Outlook, and Excel Pivot Tables.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor of Science degree in Engineering, Construction Management, or equivalent technical field. 6+ Years of Transmission Project Management experience. PMI (PMP) / CMII / AACE / Utility Technical Certifications, Contractors License, Professional Engineer LicenseUtility Experience.
